data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.expected_result: You should return to the Server Settings.
data.short_description: App crashes when pressing "Enable server-wide 2FA" at the same time with the back button
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings > Security - Tap the green "Enable server-wide 2FA requirement" button, then quickly press the back button located in the top left corner of your screen - Wait for the app to crash
